message.body: Hi Juls! I need your help! Jason cleaned the house last weekend as a Mother's Day surprise and now I can't find the invite for Dee's shower (only the bookplate for the book). It's next Saturday, right? At her mom's house. . .but what time? Thanks!!! Can't wait to see ya!
Hey girlfriend! Funnily enough I had the same request from Jenno! ï¿¼
Looking forward to seeing you! Is grace coming?
I'm dropping Grace off at my mom's, but I can bring her by afterwards. We'll see how the day goes. :).
I would love to see her if it works!
Oh definitely! I'll make it happen. I can even bring her by your mom's house if you want. :). I just don't want to distract from Dee's day.
Yay! My mom would love to meet her for sure. Let's see how it goes
